column7: a fire broke out at Soma Company coconut plantation in Kep Thmey village
column10: Kampot province.------Firefighters from the Provincial Police came to fight the blaze
column11: which was completely extinguished at 4:30 am on the same date.------The case burned 1
column12: 400 coconut trees and did not cause any damage to property and the lives of people. The cause is not yet known. ------POST NEWS
